ygData.subject: Re: [ezenchanters] Jewellery Roller coaster
ygData.msgSnippet: On prices : Not to start a price war here. But for all purpose we may all have different reasons to ply our trade, roleplay and/or greed. So far this character
ygData.messageBody:
On prices :

Not to start a price war here. But for all purpose we may all have
different reasons to ply our trade, roleplay and/or greed. So far this
character stick to the x2 cost formula and see no reason to change.

Ibnabeth / Karana



At 10:43 10/06/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
>Yes, those prices are a bit on the low side. As I stated in a previous post,
>sell the items for what they are worth, not what it costs to make them. I
>have seen flesh bands, which are loot-only items that give +2 to strength,
>sell regularly for 15-20p. That would be stretching it for the rings we
>could make, but I would suggest a minimum of 7p for the items that add 2 to
>stats.
>
>--------------------------------------------------------------
>
